text: Home » Videos » Celeb Interview » Funny Cases Ka HUNGAMA With Akshay Kumar, Saurabh Shukla, Annu Kapoor – Part 1 Funny Cases Ka HUNGAMA With Akshay Kumar, Saurabh Shukla, Annu Kapoor – Part 1 Vishnu Gade Feb 4, 2017 - 1:07 hrs IST 0 0 About the video In this Bollywood Hungama Exclusive Interview with a Content Head Broadband Faridoon Shahryar, Akshay Kumar, Saurabh Shukla and Annu Kapoor play a hilarious section in which Saurabh turns the judge and Akshay-Annu turn lawyers to solve the most bizarre cases till date. Must Watch!
